Title: Love Will Find a Way
Plot: Bruce's great day is capped off by going to a party with his wife Susan and the Deckers at the Playboy Club. Janet begins to understand how great her friendship with Susan is as she tries to get to know her new neighbors.
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
GuestStars: Mary Strong, Andrea Carina Pearson, Kelsey Crane, Robert Curtis Brown, Michael Patrick McGill, Robert Bagnell, John Getz, Muna Otaru, Mandy Levin
